title: Challenger Ahri
body: So... are they going to bring back the Challenger Ahri skin? I didn't have the points to get, but when I did it was already taken down. Is it possible to bring it back or is that up to Riot? I need my Ahri skins! {{champion:103}}

replies.body:
I think it should come back around the start of the new season (if it's a Legacy skin). They are starting a Challenger skinline to celebrate the start of every season similar how Championship skins celebrate the end of a season.
I'm not sure if it's Limited or Legacy.

They don't make limited skins anymore aside from the Victorious line. The last limited skin not in that line was Championship Riven, then they decided to stop making limited skins (aside from Victorious) so even that line (aside from Riven) is legacy now.
or just try out your luck with mystery skins ^v^'

$500 later, no Challenger Ahri.

I did, however, get every single Katarina skin which is great since she's unplayable in any form of draft.

darn, you dont seem to be having much luck, once i get ahri (that i did a little while ago) my luck might land me that skin right away o-o (gotten 4 winter skins in a row so i guess i got luck in mystery skins). good luck on your hunt tho! :D
I'd guess at the end of the season.

Hey Evilkittie13,

Since this is a legacy skin, it'll make a return at some point. Unfortunately, I don't have an ETA of when it'll be available in the store next.
It's up to Riot, so wait patiently until then :c
